segments.text: Let me tell you what happened to my homework .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , go ahead--what is the excuse THIS time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I did it , but then it got lost .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you have gotten it done at another time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have never missed an assignment before--when will you be making this one up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll make it up early next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would work , but don't let it happen again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That will solve it then . Let's work hard to not let it happen again .
segments.speaker: S2
